content: It is surprising that a search on Questionnaire using the "code" parameter cannot find values in Questionnaire.code, but only in Questionnaire.item.code. (That's the spec, and the way HAPI has implemented it.) We now have a FHIR server loaded with LOINC forms and the natural thing to do would be to search for them by their LOINC code, but you can't. I suppose we can put the code in as an "identifier", but it's a code.
That's probably a biproduct from the dstu2 design where the top level group item would have performed that role.

But obviously is wrong now.
All it would do is permit you to search for a form that has that loinc code somewhere in it.
